member.summary: Delegate for the event callback.

member.summary: Event handler invoked when the form has been submitted, regardless of success or failure.

member.summary: Event handler invoked when a change in the data upload process occurs.

member.summary: Event handler invoked before the form is submitted. If the form has validation errors or if the action has different requirements than submitting the form. this is the opportunity to intercept and cancel the form submission by setting the property value to true.

member.summary: Event handler invoked when the model to be submitted is requested.

member.summary: Gets or sets the default message to display when the form was successfully submitted.

member.summary: Gets or sets the default message to display when the form was not successfully submitted.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Components.FormManagerBase.EnableProgressBar
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the progress bar should be displayed when an upload with files is in progress.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Components.FormManagerBase.RequireModel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether specifying a non-null reference model is required when the event is invoked. If this parameter's value is true and no valid model is provided after the event has been invoked, the form submission will be cancelled.

member.summary: Sets the log level in the BlazorFormManager.js script.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Components.FormManagerBase.SetLogLevelAsync(BlazorFormManager.Debugging.ConsoleLogLevel)
member.summary: Sets the log level in the BlazorFormManager.js script using the specified .
member.param: The log level to set.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Components.FormManagerBase.OnBeforeSubmitAsync
member.summary:
When the task completes one of the following things can happen:
The event callback has a delegate: Returns a boolean value determined by the property value of an instance of the class passed to the event callback delegate.
The event callback has no delegate: Returns true if the form has validation errors, which should cancel the submission; otherwise, false is returned and the form can be safely submitted.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Components.FormManagerBase.OnGetModelAsync
member.summary: When the task completes, returns the model to be submitted. If has a delegate, the model is retrieved from after invocation of that delegate.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Components.FormManagerBase.OnBeforeSendAsync(BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult)
member.summary: Event raised before the form data is sent.
member.param: An object that contains information about the XMLHttpRequest object that is currently sending the request.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Components.FormManagerBase.OnSendFailedAsync(BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult,System.String)
member.summary: Invoked when in an error occurred during the form data submission.
member.param: An object that contains information about the XMLHttpRequest object that has sent the request.
An error message that might have been returned by the server.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Components.FormManagerBase.OnSendSucceededAsync(BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult,System.String)
member.summary: Invoked when the form data has been successfully uploaded.
member.param: An object that contains information about the XMLHttpRequest object that has sent the request.
A message that might have been returned by the server.

member.summary: Event fired each time a change occurs in the upload process.
member.param: An object that holds event data related to the upload.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Components.FormManagerBase.OnAjaxUploadWithProgressNotSupportedAsync(BlazorFormManager.Debugging.AjaxUploadNotSupportedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the user's browser does not support AJAX upload with progress report. Return false to continue form submission using full-page refresh; otherwise, true to cancel the form submission.

member.summary: For debugging purposes only. Invokes the 'raiseAjaxUploadWithProgressNotSupported' JavaScript function in BlazorFormManager.js file.
member.exception: BlazorFormManager.js script has not been initialized.

member.summary: Indicates, when applicable, whether to interpret HTTP responses with the structure or not. This could be potentially dangerous if the server is not trustworthy.

member.summary: Provides debugging information and configuration values for HTTP requests done with JavaScript's XMLHttpRequest object.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.Cancel
member.summary: Indicates whether an event caller should quit further processing. This property is not part of the XMLHttpRequest object.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.RequestHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets the request headers.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.Response
member.summary: Gets or sets the response's body content as an ArrayBuffer, Blob, Document, JavaScript Object, or DOMString, depending on the value of the request's responseType property.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.ResponseHeaders
member.summary:
Gets or sets all the response headers, separated by CRLF, as a string, or returns null if no response has been received. If a network error happened, an empty string is returned.
Raw header string example:
date: Fri, 24 Jul 2020 21:04:30 GMT
 content-encoding: gzip
 x-content-type-options: nosniff
 server: meinheld/0.6.1
 x-frame-options: DENY
 content-type: text/html; charset=utf-8
 connection: keep-alive
 strict-transport-security: max-age=63072000
 vary: Cookie, Accept-Encoding
 content-length: 6502
 x-xss-protection: 1; mode=block

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.ResponseText
member.summary: Gets or set the text received from a server following a request being sent.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.ResponseType
member.summary: Gets or sets an enumerated string value specifying the type of data contained in the response. It also lets the author change the response type. If an empty string is set as the value of responseType, the default value of text is used. Supported values are: arraybuffer, blob, document, json, text, ms-stream

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.ResponseUrl
member.summary: The read-only XMLHttpRequest.responseURL property returns the serialized URL of the response or the empty string if the URL is null. If the URL is returned, any URL fragment present in the URL will be stripped away. The value of responseURL will be the final URL obtained after any redirects.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.ResponseXML
member.summary: The XMLHttpRequest.responseXML read-only property returns a Document containing the HTML or XML retrieved by the request; or null if the request was unsuccessful, has not yet been sent, or if the data can't be parsed as XML or HTML.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.Status
member.summary: The read-only XMLHttpRequest.status property returns the numerical HTTP status code of the XMLHttpRequest's response.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.StatusText
member.summary: The read-only XMLHttpRequest.statusText property returns a DOMString containing the response's status message as returned by the HTTP server. Unlike XMLHTTPRequest.status which indicates a numerical status code, this property contains the text of the response status, such as "OK" or "Not Found". If the request's readyState is in UNSENT or OPENED state, the value of statusText will be an empty string.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.WithCredentials
member.summary: The XMLHttpRequest.withCredentials property is a Boolean that indicates whether or not cross-site Access-Control requests should be made using credentials such as cookies, authorization headers or TLS client certificates. Setting withCredentials has no effect on same-site requests.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.ExtraProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets supplementary properties received from an XMLHttpRequest object.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.IsSuccessStatusCode
member.summary: Determines whether the code indicates success (integer between 200 and 299 inclusive).

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.Headers
member.summary: Gets a read-only dictionary of all the response headers.

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.IsHtmlResponse
member.summary: Determines whether the 'content-type' response header value contains the word 'html' (case-insensitive lookup).

member.name: P:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.IsJsonResponse
member.summary: Determines whether the 'content-type' response header value contains the word 'json' (case-insensitive lookup).

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.ResponseContentTypeContains(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the 'content-type' response header contains the specified value (case-insensitive lookup).
member.param: The header value to lookup.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.ResponseContentTypeContains(System.String,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Determines whether the 'content-type' response header contains the specified value using the specified string comparison.
member.param: The header value to lookup.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the rules to use in the comparison.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.ParseResponseType
member.summary: Returns the property as a well-known enumeration value.

member.name: M:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.FormManagerXhrResult.GetAllResponseHeaders
member.summary: Parse the property into a collection of key-value pairs of string elements.

member.name: T:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.XMLHttpRequestResponseType
member.summary: Provides enumeration values for HTTP response types received through JavaScript's XMLHttpRequest object.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.XMLHttpRequestResponseType.Text
member.summary: The response is a text in a DOMString object.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.XMLHttpRequestResponseType.ArrayBuffer
member.summary: The response is a JavaScript ArrayBuffer containing binary data.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.XMLHttpRequestResponseType.Blob
member.summary: The response is a Blob object containing the binary data.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.XMLHttpRequestResponseType.Document
member.summary: The response is an HTML Document or XML XMLDocument, as appropriate based on the MIME type of the received data.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.XMLHttpRequestResponseType.Json
member.summary: The response is a JavaScript object created by parsing the contents of received data as JSON.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.Debugging.XMLHttpRequestResponseType.MsStream
member.summary: The response is part of a streaming download; this response type is only allowed for download requests, and is only supported by Internet Explorer.

member.summary: Gets or sets the upload progress event type.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of bytes sent so far.

member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of bytes to send.

member.summary: Indicates whether a form upload contains files.

member.summary: Gets the upload progress percentage.

member.name: T:BlazorFormManager.UploadProgressEventType
member.summary: Upload progress event types.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.UploadProgressEventType.Start
member.summary: The upload has begun.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.UploadProgressEventType.Progress
member.summary: Periodically delivered to indicate the amount of progress made so far.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.UploadProgressEventType.Complete
member.summary: The upload completed successfully.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.UploadProgressEventType.Error
member.summary: The upload failed due to an error.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.UploadProgressEventType.Abort
member.summary: The upload operation was aborted.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.UploadProgressEventType.Timeout
member.summary: The upload timed out because a reply did not arrive within the time interval specified by the XMLHttpRequest.timeout.

member.name: F:BlazorFormManager.UploadProgressEventType.End
member.summary: The upload finished. This event does not differentiate between success or failure, and is sent at the end of the upload regardless of the outcome. Prior to this event, one of , , , or will already have been delivered to indicate why the upload ended.
